Uses of Class
opendial.inference.queries.ProbQuery

  • Packages that use ProbQuery 
    Package Description
    opendial.inference  
    opendial.inference.approximate  
    opendial.inference.exact  
    opendial.inference.queries  

    • Uses of ProbQuery in opendial.inference

      Methods in opendial.inference with parameters of type ProbQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentProbDistribution InferenceAlgorithm.queryProb(ProbQuery query)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variables given the provided evidence, all specified in the query
      IndependentProbDistribution SwitchingAlgorithm.queryProb(ProbQuery query)
      Selects the best algorithm for performing the inference on the provided probability query and return its result.

    • Uses of ProbQuery in opendial.inference.approximate

      Methods in opendial.inference.approximate with parameters of type ProbQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Assignment LikelihoodWeighting.extractSample(ProbQuery query)
      Extracts a unique (non reweighted) sample for the query.
      EmpiricalDistribution LikelihoodWeighting.queryProb(ProbQuery query)
      Queries for the probability distribution of the set of random variables in the Bayesian network, given the provided evidence

    • Uses of ProbQuery in opendial.inference.exact

      Methods in opendial.inference.exact with parameters of type ProbQuery 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CategoricalTable NaiveInference.queryProb(ProbQuery query)
      Queries the probability distribution encoded in the Bayesian Network, given a set of query variables, and some evidence.
      CategoricalTable VariableElimination.queryProb(ProbQuery query)
      Queries for the probability distribution of the set of random variables in the Bayesian network, given the provided evidence

    • Uses of ProbQuery in opendial.inference.queries

      Subclasses of ProbQuery in opendial.inference.queries 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReductionQuery
      Representation of a reduction query corresponding to the estimation of the probability distributions for a reduced version of the Bayesian network.
